title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
description: Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, when selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
OB: When selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: It is expected that when selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all the saved files should be closed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Close all editors.
3. Create a new file f1.txt.
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
